name: DomesticViolenceOrIntimatePartnerViolence
title: Domestic Violence or Intimate Partner Violence
description: Indication that the person has experienced domestic violence/intimate partner violence (Business ID: Entry 3788694)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Domestic Violence or Intimate Partner Violence.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an indication that the person has experienced domestic violence/intimate partner violence.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD10CM codes for Domestic Violence or Intimate Partner Violence.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Domestic Violence or Intimate Partner Violence.)
